version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - More improvements to docking logic

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Avoid stopping preview on tuning changes

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fix crash with long audio files. (Analyze 1 sec max) - Update toolbar toggle state in media explorer section

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added option to search filename for key information - Added option to use the 'key' metadata tag - Fix crash with option to hide file extensions - Exit script when media explorer window is closed

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Support parsing minor keys - Properly check if media explorer is closed (for custom actions)

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Support more file name patterns - Fix bug with reading metadata

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Show warning when media explorer is not open

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Open media explorer on start if not open already

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Remember undocked window position - Added option to avoid keyboard focus (enabled by default) - Added option to hide window frame - Locked key now adapts to pitch dial changes

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fix focus behavior on windows

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Add option to keep window on top

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Detect and allow tuning via rate knob - Added themes

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Correctly apply window settings when undocking manually

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fix bug where docking wouldn't work on a fresh install

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fix issue with open action list

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fix issue with details/list view on Windows

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added support for MIDI

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added support for MIDI files - Improved pitch detection from file name (more cases) - Added indicator icon that shows when using pitch from metadata or filename

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Improved tuning to continuous values (cents) using native actions - Continuous pitch mode is now default - Fixed crash with certain file extensions

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Catch minor/major keywords when parsing file names

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Correctly detect files in databases when file extension is hidden

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Improved FFT detection algorithm - Avoid keeping files in use so that they can be deleted (windows) - Fixed minor theme menu bug

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Improved file name pitch detection - Set FFT algorithm as default

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Alt-click on a key now adds 'key' metadata (not automatic on MacOS) - Alt-click on the metadata icon now removes 'key' metadata - Improved FFT pitch detection algorithm (better harmonics detection) - MX tuner now finds and analyzes the loudest section of a file - Added configurable analysis window in menu > algorithm - FTC algorithm is now deprecated

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Stop running script when window is closed - Small performance improvement

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Add tooltips to detection indicator icons - Avoid "Terminate instance" dialog

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Rework "Avoid focus" mode to only switch focus when clicking inside window

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Improve CPU usage

reapack.name: Lil Chordbox.lua

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Detect chords with 2 notes (dyads) - Slightly change naming convention to match chordgun - Fixed an issue where certain inversions could't be detected

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added hdpi support - Changed selection mode to consider all selected notes in item

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added options menu - Support custom user colors - Option to run script on startup

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fixed issue with where certain chords at mouse cursor would not be recognized - Fixed possible crash when getting MIDI input events

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added option to use edit cursor instead of mouse

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Display chord degrees when key snap is enabled - Added solfege mode option (Do, Re, Mi) - Remove dependency on SWS extension - Fixed tooltips not showing on Windows - Display warning when REAPER version is below 6.40 - Fixed custom color issue with icons

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added support for chord detection in looped items

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added detection of octaves & compound intervals - Improved detection of complex overlapping chords - Added option to create project regions from chords - Added option to disable live input detection (save cpu)

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added menu option to create take markers from chords

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Possible bugfix for MacOS M1 systems

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Avoid opening menu when MIDI editor is not visible

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Combine created adjacent regions with same chords

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Live input: Treat notes with 0 velocity as noteoffs

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Ignore muted notes

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Live input: Allow input from virtual keyboard - Live input: Fixed handling of MIDI channels

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Support creating MIDI text events from chords

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Support exporting chords as project markers - Support exporting chords as notation events

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Improve interaction with tooltips on Windows

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Add chord degree display options

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Add chord degree display options - Support exporting to chord track

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Add preference to set chord display to flat/sharp (default is now flat) - Add preference to auto-detect flats/sharps when key snap is enabled (on by default) - Add option to set chord track name - Add option to reuse existing chord track - Ctrl+click on Lil Chordbox exports chords with the last used export option - Any click on Lil Chordbox now resets live input detection (get rid of stuck notes) - Fix live input display when playing the same chord consecutively (1.8.0 regression) - Improve project region export behavior

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Support REAPER v7 (size changed)

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fix crash when glueing MIDI items

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Windows: Improve behavior of MIDI channel combobox

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Optimized idle CPU usage - Open ReaPack window to install JS_ReaScriptAPI (if not installed)

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Fix JS_ReaScript prompt

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Support detecting "add9 omit5" chords

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Improve CPU consumption during playback

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added diminished chords m7b5, m7b9, m7b5b9

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Added add11 chords

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Avoid opening menu when mouse drag starts outside of window

version.author: Ilias-Timon Poulakis (FeedTheCat)
version.changelog: - Add option to display chord inversions
